name: MotoHeroz
overview: Racing game thrills meet platformer charm in MotoHeroz, a side-scrolling racer built with simple controls and engaging physics. The result is a new kind of racing adventure! Players race, chase, and rally their way through a brightly colored world, competing against their friends for the fastest times, entering daily races, and hunting for secrets and coins. Features • Rich single player Story Adventure • Two to four player Party Rally local multiplayer • Daily online competitions with Leader Boards • 100+ tracks, 14 cars, and 3 game modes = tons of fun!
